COMMENT_TX: ej,silvc001,P,mealj901,Balls and strikes after removal ej,gardr001,M,mealj901,Balls and strikes $Silva barked at HP umpire Jerry Meals as he exited; Twins pitcher Carlos Silva and Manager Ron Gardenhire ejected by HP umpire Jerry Meals
ej,gardr001,M,davig901,Kicking hat as he left the field Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire ejected by HP umpire Gerry Davis for arguing that Castillo's grounder was foul; Gardenhire dropped-kicked his hat
Twins second baseman Luis Castillo left the game due to an injured leg
ej,guilo001,M,scotd901,Arguing that batter swung at pitch that hit him White Sox Manager Ozzie Guillen ejected by 1B umpire Dale Scott for arguing that Cuddyer swung at the pitch that hit him
ej,coopd001,C,kulpr901,Arguing that batter swung at pitch that hit him White Sox Pitching Coach Don Cooper ejected by HP umpire Ron Kulpa for arguing that Cuddyer swung at the pitch that hit him
Twins shortstop Juan Castro left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
ej,gardr001,M,scotd901,Called third strike Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire ejected by HP umpire Dale Scott

ej,gardr001,M,herna901,Obstruction call at 2B Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire ejected by 2B umpire Angel Hernandez for arguing the obstruction called by Hernandez on Nick Punto when he and Grady Sizemore got tangled at the bag as the ball rolled away
$Carl Everett rounded 3B too far and the run scored before he was tagged out to end the inning

ej,gardr001,M,rapue901,Foul tip call Twins Manager Ron Gardenhire ejected by HP umpire Ed Rapuano; he argued that there was no foul tip and Cuddyer checked his swing
